text: William Troy (1848–1907) was a US Navy Medal of Honor recipient. William Troy may also refer to: *William F. Troy (1920–1967), American Jesuit, president of Wheeling Jesuit University *William Troy (abolitionist) (1827–1905), Baptist minister, writer, abolitionist *William Troy (educator) (1903–1961), American writer and teacher ==See also== *William Troy Herriage, baseball player
title: William Troy (disambiguation)
